import React, { Component } from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' export default function AddCaption(props) { let [caption, captionSubmitted, updateCaption] = useState("") const handleClick = (e) => { console.log('hello') e.preventDefault() if (!caption) return addCaption (caption) updateCaption("") console.log(caption) captionSubmitted = caption } console.log() const addCaption = text => { const newCaption = [{text}] updateCaption(newCaption) } return (<>

ADD A CAPTION

updateCaption(e.target.value)} />

{caption}

) }
